abstract: Choreographer, performer and musician Steven Reker wins American Dance Institute’s second annual Solange MacArthur Award for New Choreography; award provides financial and administrative support to rising choreographer for production of new work.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer, performer and musician Steven Reker of Brooklyn is the winner of the American Dance Institute’s second annual Solange MacArthur Award for New Choreography.
snippet: The choreographer, performer and musician Steven Reker of Brooklyn is the winner of the American Dance Institute’s second annual Solange MacArthur Award for New Choreography.
